程序包 Jest

类 Card

java.lang.Object
Jest.Card
直接已知子类:
Joker, SuitCard
public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
The class Card represents all the cards used for playing (suit cards and Joker). It is an abstract class.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    Card()
    Card() is the constructor of the class Card.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean cardEquals​(Card card)
    cardEquals(Card card) allows to compare if the present card is same to a card sent in as parameter.
    boolean comCard​(Card card)
    comCard(Card card) only compares value and suit when deciding the order of taking offers
    boolean compareCard​(Card card)
    compareCard(Card card) is for STRATEGY design pattern.
    void facedown()
    facedown() allows to face down a card by setting its face status to false.
    void faceup()
    faceup() allows to face up a card by setting its face status to true.
    java.lang.String getChar()
    getChar() allows to get the characteristic of the card from outside.
    boolean isJoker()
    isJoker() is to check if the card is of the type Joker Joker
    boolean showface()
    showface() allows to get the face status of the card.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Overwrite the function toString() to display the type and characteristics of the card.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Card

      public Card()
      Card() is the constructor of the class Card. There is no parameters. To create a card by default, the card is faced down and its characteristic is undefined.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getChar

      public java.lang.String getChar()
      getChar() allows to get the characteristic of the card from outside.
      返回:
      type of a String, which is the characteristic of the card.

    • facedown

      public void facedown()
      facedown() allows to face down a card by setting its face status to false.

    • faceup

      public void faceup()
      faceup() allows to face up a card by setting its face status to true.

    • showface

      public boolean showface()
      showface() allows to get the face status of the card.
      返回:
      type of a boolean to show whether the card is faced up(true) or faced down(false).

    • cardEquals

      public boolean cardEquals​(Card card)
      cardEquals(Card card) allows to compare if the present card is same to a card sent in as parameter. If the two cards are the same, they have the same type. If they are both SuitCard, they have the same suits and the same values.
      参数:
      card - is a instance of Card which is to be compared with the instance who call the function.
      返回:
      type of a boolean to show if the two cards are the same.

    • isJoker

      public boolean isJoker()
      isJoker() is to check if the card is of the type Joker Joker
      返回:
      type of a boolean to show the result. True means is a Joker and false means is not.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overwrite the function toString() to display the type and characteristics of the card.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

    • comCard

      public boolean comCard​(Card card)
      comCard(Card card) only compares value and suit when deciding the order of taking offers
      参数:
      card - is a instance of Card which is to be compared with the instance who call the function.
      返回:
      type of a boolean to show if the card is the better one.

    • compareCard

      public boolean compareCard​(Card card)
      compareCard(Card card) is for STRATEGY design pattern. To make the jest biggest, we first tend to choose Spade, then Club, then Joker, then Heart, finally Diamonds If the suits of two cards are the same, we tend to choose the one of the bigger value If "this" card is the better choice, return true; else return false
      参数:
      card - is a instance of Card which is to be compared with the instance who call the function.
      返回:
      type of a boolean to show if the card is the better one.
